archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.4.1b: b) mechanisms for ensuring systems comply with good practice for system build (e.g. the use of structured programming techniques, methods of secure program coding and documenting/commenting of code)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
